item.title: ACM SIGIR 東京支部がACMに承認されました
item.author: sigir-tokyo@googlegroups.com (ACM SIGIR 東京支部)
item.description: 2017年12月27にACM SIGIR 東京支部がACMに承認されました。 これをもって、ACM SIGIR 東京支部の公式な活動が開始されました。

item.title: About Tokyo ACM SIGIR Chapter
item.author: sigir-tokyo@googlegroups.com (ACM SIGIR 東京支部)
item.description: ACM SIGIR*is the largest international research community in the field of information retrieval (IR) and organizes peer-reviewed international conferences such as SIGIR, WSDM, CIKM, CHIIR, and so on. ACM has approved “Tokyo ACM SIGIR Chapter” as the first SIGIR local chapter in Japan since 27th December, 2017. In Japan, IR is one of computer science fields where researchers have been energetically working from diverse perspectives such as information access, databases, natural language processing, artificial intelligence, human computer interaction, digital libraries, knowledge management, and so on.
